attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At a time when we don't need lithium and lithium-ion batteries, because there are better rechargeable batteries as well as non-rechargeable manganese ones for those who haven't bought a battery recharger, it's environmentally dangerous and technically unnecessary to use Li and Li-Ion batteries, so please ban them and ask other governments to do so as well.
